name: Button Group
description: Buttons composed in a UI Lab Group component. Covers toolbar formatting controls, segmented option selectors, and split-button arrangements.
notes: Group with spacing='none' and no variant gives a flat connected group. Divider component between groups creates visual separation without full gaps.

variations.name: Horizontal with Divider
variations.description: Two groups separated by a Divider — primary actions and a secondary destructive action.

variations.name: Icon Only
variations.description: Icon-only buttons in a compact Group. Each button should have an aria-label.
variations.code:
import { Button, Group } from 'ui-lab-components'

function ButtonGroupIcon() {
  return (
    <Group spacing="none">
      <Button variant="ghost" size="sm" aria-label="Align left">
        <svg width="14" height="14" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
          <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth={2} d="M4 6h16M4 12h10M4 18h16" />
        </svg>
      </Button>
      <Button variant="ghost" size="sm" aria-label="Align center">
        <svg width="14" height="14" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
          <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth={2} d="M4 6h16M7 12h10M4 18h16" />
        </svg>
      </Button>
      <Button variant="ghost" size="sm" aria-label="Align right">
        <svg width="14" height="14" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
          <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth={2} d="M4 6h16M10 12h10M4 18h16" />
        </svg>
      </Button>
    </Group>
  )
}
